column5: here's a pic of one i tied a few minutes ago, personally thing they're gettin a bit better.  it is a full size BIC by the way
looks good to me ! Like the clear beads. TB
about 300 of them for 1.13 @ Dollarama it's where i got all the beads in my fly box feathers,(hackle) marabou, and a few other things in the craft section
did you learn on your own or the internet and or books?
And I thought I was beatin' the system by getting my beads at a craft store, buck or two here I come.

just started tying streamers and dry flies and spinners a few years back as a hobbie, a lot of choice words and ugly lookin flies and slowly started gettin better hahah dollar store is great look in the "jewellery" section craft section and even the little fishing section for some stufff that you may need
NO! Buying tackle is a complicated process that requires planning, stops at 3 major stores and a co-signed loan...   Well... that only happened once.
